"Will You Call Us Too?":
"I have been ordered to complete a
Desert Exploration mission.
Leader, I would like you to accompany
me, but the two of us alone will struggle.
I want you to call Kazami-no-tachi and
Optreion as well.
It may be a difficult mission for them, but
it will also be valuable combat experience.
※Clear on Normal or higher accompanied
by Ignis, Kazami-no-tachi and Optreion"
